title: is there a way to change a list of Variable(FloatTensor) to a giant new Variable(FloatTensor)?
body_html:
Here is the code and error message:

a=Variable(torch.FloatTensor([1]))
b=a
c=[a,b]
Variable(c)

Error:RuntimeError: Variable data has to be a tensor, but got list

c=[a.data,b.data]
torch.FloatTensor(c)

Error:TypeError: 'FloatTensor' object does not support indexing
body_text:
Here is the code and error message:
a=Variable(torch.FloatTensor([1]))
b=a
c=[a,b]
Variable(c)
Error:RuntimeError: Variable data has to be a tensor, but got list
c=[a.data,b.data]
torch.FloatTensor(c)
Error:TypeError: 'FloatTensor' object does not support indexing
body:
Here is the code and error message:
```python
a=Variable(torch.FloatTensor([1]))
b=a
c=[a,b]
Variable(c)
```
Error:RuntimeError: Variable data has to be a tensor, but got list

```python
c=[a.data,b.data]
torch.FloatTensor(c)
```
Error:TypeError: 'FloatTensor' object does not support indexing
